subject: World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: Aaron Cruden will start this week for New Zealand against its biggest rival, Australia, in the Rugby World Cup semi-final after the team's top 2 flyhalfs went down with injuries.
snippet: Aaron Cruden will start this week for New Zealand against its biggest rival, Australia, in the Rugby World Cup semi-final after the team's top 2 flyhalfs went down with injuries.
